definition[0]: to replace something you own with something better, or buy a better type of thing than before
example[0]: It also encourages existing home owners to trade up to larger accommodation.
definition[1]: to buy more expensive goods that are of better quality
example[1]: Thousands of small-apartment owners are trading up for more luxurious accommodation.
example[2]: Home-computer buyers are trading up to machines with more power and speed.
